metadata.title: CVE-2024-28871 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: LibHTP is a security-aware parser for the HTTP protocol and the relatedbits and pieces. Version 0.5.46 may parse malformed request traffic,leading to excessive CPU usage. Version 0.5.47 contains a patch for theissue. No known workarounds are available.

criterions.comment: libhtp package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
